home.title: AI Cube - Home
home.description: Welcome to AI Cube – Learn AI Through Play. A simulation-based learning platform.

hero.title: AI CUBE.
hero.tagline: Where young minds master AI through play. Give your child the skills that will define their future.
hero.subheading: The world's first AI mastery platform designed for children. Interactive simulations teach real AI concepts through engaging, hands-on experiences.
hero.caption: Join thousands of families preparing their children for an AI-driven world.

access.thisIs: AI Cube is more: It's an interactive codex, unlocking your child’s innate genius to sculpt the future of intelligence.
access.quote: "The world your child will inherit is built on AI. This gives them the keys."
access.trySnake3: Begin the Serpent's Trial: Your First Glimpse Inside the Cube

core.classifierVoice: **Sculpt** cosmic patterns. **Train** your AI to perceive hidden orders and classify the unseen. Unveil the logic within chaos.
core.predictorVoice: **Forecast** future events. **Master** the art of probability and guide your AI to anticipate outcomes. The threads of destiny await your weave.
core.visionVoice: **Decode** visual enigmas. **Empower** your AI to interpret complex imagery and recognize subtle anomalies. See beyond the veil.
core.ethicsStatus: Unlocked via Trial: The Guardian's Code
core.ethicsVoice: **Navigate** moral mazes. **Instill** your AI with a core of wisdom to make just choices. The balance of creation is in your hands.
core.reinforcementVoice: **Forge** adaptive intelligence. **Guide** your AI through trial and triumph to learn optimal strategies. Shape an evolving mind.
core.generativeStatus: Phase 3 Access: The Dream Weaver's Loom
core.generativeVoice: **Create** novel realities. **Unleash** your AI's potential to synthesize original art, music, and narratives. Breathe life into imagination.
core.decisionTreesStatus: Unlocked via Trial: The Cartographer's Compass
core.decisionTreesVoice: **Chart** pathways of choice. **Construct** intricate decision models for your AI to navigate complex scenarios. Every branch a new possibility.
core.neuralNetworkStatus: Phase 2 Access: The Mind Architect's Blueprint
core.neuralNetworkVoice: **Architect** interconnected thought. **Build** the foundational structures of an artificial mind, layer by layer. The nexus of intelligence awaits.
core.foundersStatus: Phase 4 Access: The Genesis Protocol (Coming Soon)
core.foundersVoice: **Ascend** to ultimate creation. **Synthesize** all learned wisdom to design a truly emergent AI. The final enigma of the Cube.

login.subtitle: Your family's gateway to AI mastery
login.loginError: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
login.passwordMismatch: Passwords don't match. Please try again.
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long for security.
login.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
login.registrationError: Registration failed. This email may already be in use.

parentPortal.title: Family Command Center
parentPortal.noActiveSubscriptionMessage: Choose a plan to unlock your child's AI journey.
parentPortal.welcomeTitle: Ready to unlock your child's AI potential?
parentPortal.welcomeMessage: You're one step away from giving your child the tools to thrive in an AI-driven world. Choose a plan to begin their journey.
parentPortal.subscriptionBenefit1: Comprehensive AI curriculum designed for young minds
parentPortal.subscriptionBenefit2: Real-time progress insights and skill tracking
parentPortal.subscriptionBenefit3: Support for up to 5 children per account

studentDashboard.title: {{name}}'s Dashboard
studentDashboard.noGamesAvailable: No games data available yet. Go play!
studentDashboard.noSkillsTracked: No skills tracked yet. Keep playing to unlock them!

classifier-construct.name: Pattern Recognition Lab
classifier-construct.description: Build AI systems that can identify and classify different objects and data patterns.

crystal-resonance.name: Crystal Resonance
crystal-resonance.description: Develop memory and sequence recognition skills through interactive crystal patterns.

decision-tree-game.name: Decision Maker
decision-tree-game.description: Learn how AI makes intelligent choices by building and testing decision trees.

neural-forge.name: Neural Network Builder
neural-forge.description: Construct and train your own neural networks to solve real-world problems.

neural-network-chamber.name: Brain Simulator
neural-network-chamber.description: Explore how artificial brains work by experimenting with neural network structures.

neural-pathways.name: Neural Pathways
neural-pathways.description: Discover how information flows through AI systems by mapping neural connections.

predictor-engine-game.name: Future Predictor
predictor-engine-game.description: Build AI models that can predict future events based on past data.

quantum-chamber-game.name: Quantum Computing Lab
quantum-chamber-game.description: Experience the mind-bending world of quantum computing and superposition.

reinforcement-lab.name: AI Training Ground
reinforcement-lab.description: Teach AI agents to learn from their mistakes and improve over time.

snake-3.name: AI Snake Challenge
snake-3.description: Program an AI to play the classic Snake game using machine learning algorithms.

trajectory-game.name: Physics Predictor
trajectory-game.description: Use AI to calculate and predict the movement of objects through space.

vision-system.name: Computer Vision Lab
vision-system.description: Train AI to see and understand images just like human vision works.

philosophy.title: The Heart of AI Cube: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Discover the core principles that drive our educational games and experiences.

new_point1.title: Not your average subscription.
new_point1.description: This isn’t Netflix for math. It’s a simulator of minds — each payment unlocks more power.

new_point2.title: Not a linear course.
new_point2.description: There are no chapters. There are only riddles to decode, systems to master, and myths to forge.

new_point3.title: Not just a game.
new_point3.description: It’s gameplay with gravity — AI fluency disguised as play.
